summary: AN ORDINANCE requiring that certain elected Seattle City Officials pay for the parking of privately-owned motor vehicles in the Municipal Building garage and other City-owned parking facilities in which other City officers or employees must pay to park such motor vehicles; providing for the availability of parking for such City Officials; authorizing the establishment of rates for such parking; establishing the effective dates for such rates; authorizing the collection of voluntary payments from such City Officials for parking in such facilities prior to such rates becoming effective; and amending Section 4.20.375 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
